channel.description: Recent content in git on eduuh

item.title: Github Actions and Workflows Guide
item.author: edwinkamaumuraya0@outlook.com (Edwin Muraya)
item.description: Some Terms you Need to Understand. Events. Trigger the workflow. Workflows. A workflow is a group of jobs. Workflow runs in a reqular or triggerd by events Jobs. Jobs are a group of actions which are run in steps. Step. Performs one actions. deployment Action. Run a single shell command. Virtual Environment A worklow runs on a virtual environments. Runners Github-hosted Runners self-hosted Runners Github Action is a tool that lets you automate your software development workflows.
item.dc:creator: eduuh

item.title: Basic Git WorkShop
item.author: edwinkamaumuraya0@outlook.com (Edwin Muraya)
item.description: Welcome, lets get into the task ahead. Learning Objectives Get to Learn what Git is Learn about some Usefull linux tools Learn basic Cli tools. Tip and Tricks when Using Git Learn How to use Git To Understanding Opensource Project Practical Uses of Git as a daily driver apart from projects Automation with github worflow Creating a portfolio static site and deploying it azure with github pages. Requirements Command Line that support unix style commands.
item.dc:creator: eduuh

item.title: Dotfiles sync with bare repository
item.author: edwinkamaumuraya0@outlook.com (Edwin Muraya)
item.description: weight: 5 A simpler way to manage your dotfiles Hey there am edd. I was having trouble with configuration files since I started using docker for my development. I realized I was reconfiguring each time I recreated a new environment. For consistecy and time saving , I decided it would be great if could sync my dotfiles using git and github and when creating new enviroments. I wrote the solution in this post, for easy reference if i need to in the future.
item.dc:creator: eduuh
